steps.name: clicks the "Buy Now" CTA or any product card on the listing page
adds the product to the cart and proceeds to the Cart page
verifies the Cart page features and Order summary detail.Then,proceeds to the Checkout page
enters the shipping and billing details
selects a payment option and places the order
after successful payment, the user should see the Thank You page
